incidents.name: Twilio Rest API Impacting Multiple Products

incident_updates.body: All services impacted by an issue with Twilio Rest API have recovered and are operating as intended. This incident has been resolved.

We are observing recovery with the Twilio Rest API issue impacting multiple Twilio services: Messaging, CDX, Studio and Flex. We will be monitoring all services to ensure full recovery and provide another update in 30 minutes or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are experiencing an issue with the Twilio Rest API, impacting multiple Twilio services: Messaging, CDX, Studio and Flex. For Messaging, Verify SMS and WhatsApp is experiencing degradation in several countries and there are elevated API latency, delayed and failed messages for MMS and SMS. For Studio, some customers may experience failures in widgets that sending messages. For Flex, the ability to send and receive messages are impacted. Our engineering team is actively working to resolve the issue. We expect to provide another update in 30 mins or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are experiencing an issue with the Twilio Rest API, impacting multiple Twilio services: Messaging, CDX, Studio and Flex. For Messaging, Verify SMS and WhatsApp is experiencing degradation in several countries and there are elevated API latency, delayed and failed messages for MMS and SMS. For Studio, some customers may experience failures in widgets that sending messages. For Flex, the ability to send and receive messages are impacted. Our engineering team is actively working to resolve the issue. We expect to provide another update in 30 mins or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are experiencing an issue with the Twilio Rest API, impacting multiple Twilio services: Flex, CDX, and Messaging. For Flex, the ability to send and receive messages are impacted. Studio is still operational but some customers may experience failures in widgets that sending messages. For Messaging, Verify SMS and WhatsApp is experiencing degradation in several countries and there are elevated API latency, delayed and failed messages for MMS and SMS. Our engineering team is actively working to resolve the issue. We expect to provide another update in 30 mins or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are experiencing an issue with the Twilio Rest API, impacting multiple Twilio services: Voice, Flex, CDX, and Messaging.  Our engineering team is actively working to resolve the issue. We expect to provide another update in 30 mins or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are experiencing an issue impacting SMS, MMS, Voice, Verify, Flex, and Proxy.  Our engineering team is actively working to resolve the issue. We expect to provide another update in 30 mins or as soon as more information becomes available.

We've become aware of a potential issue with SMS, MMS, Flex Messaging, and Verify. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have more information.

We've become aware of a potential issue with MMS. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have more information.

incidents.name: Customers Remaining Suspended After Making Payments

incident_updates.body: We have detected an issue where Pay-As-You-Go customers are seeing their accounts remain in a suspended status after making a successful payment. Our Engineers are actively investigating this issue. In the meantime, we ask that customers experiencing this issue sign out and sign back in to refresh their credentials, and if their account is still suspended and it’s been more than 20 minutes since the payment was made, submit a support ticket. We expect to provide another update in 8 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We have detected an issue where Pay-As-You-Go customers are seeing their accounts remain in a suspended status after making a successful payment. Our Engineers are actively investigating this issue. In the meantime, we ask that customers experiencing this issue sign out and sign back in to refresh their credentials, and if their account is still suspended and it’s been more than 20 minutes since the payment was made, submit a support ticket. We expect to provide another update in 4 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We expect to provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We expect to provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

incidents.name: WhatsApp Registration and Template Status Issues

incident_updates.body:
Some WhatsApp templates may have an incorrect category or the template status may temporarily be outdated. As a result, sending WhatsApp messages using a template with an outdated status may fail until the status is updated. Any new template status updates are correctly being captured. Our engineering team has identified the cause for outdated statuses and is working on a fix to ensure all template statuses are up to date.

Any onboarding issues for new WhatsApp senders have been mitigated. There is also no impact to receiving WhatsApp messages.

We will provide an update in 8 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

Some WhatsApp templates may have a incorrect category or the template status may temporarily be outdated. As a result, sending WhatsApp messages using a template with an outdated status may fail until the status is updated. Additionally, some customers may experience issues when onboarding new WhatsApp senders. 

There is no impact to receiving WhatsApp messages. Our engineering team has identified the cause and has deployed a fix.
We will provide an update in 4 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

Some WhatsApp templates may have a incorrect category or the template status may temporarily be outdated. As a result, sending WhatsApp messages using a template with an outdated status may fail until the status is updated. Additionally, some customers may experience issues when onboarding new WhatsApp senders. 

There is no impact to receiving WhatsApp messages. Our engineering team is investigating this issue and will provide an update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are investigating an issue with WhatsApp registration and template status. Customers may experience issues when onboarding new WhatsApp senders. WhatsApp templates may also contain an incorrect status. There is no impact to sending or receiving WhatsApp messages. We will provide an update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are investigating an issue with WhatsApp registration and template status. Customers may experience issues when onboarding new WhatsApp senders. WhatsApp templates may also contain an incorrect status. There is no impact to sending or receiving WhatsApp messages. We will provide an update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.
Our monitoring systems have detected a potential issue with WhatsApp. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have more information.

incidents.name: PSTN Outbound Calls in Japan Affected

incident_updates.body: PSTN outbound calls in Japan were degraded for 3 hours and 49 minutes between 08:00 and 11:49 Pacific Time on 08/16/2023. During this period of time, customers may have experienced 404 errors. The issue has now been resolved.

incidents.name: 10DLC brand registrations for Canadian brands

incident_updates.body: Twilio 10 DLC brand registrations for Canadian brands were degraded between July 19th to August 9th. During this period of time, customers may have experienced 10DLC brand registration for Canadian brand failures. The issue has now been resolved for any new brands registered with Canadian Business Number. Twilio is working on a fix for the Brands submitted during the incident period. You may also alternatively delete the brand and register a new one.
Our engineers are currently investigating the customer impact of a retroactive issue with brand registration failures. We will follow up and provide customer impact details within 2 hours.
